name: Deseret2
startIntroPart1: Every day, we fall. Some days are harder than others. The day the nukes were launched... was the hardest fall yet for mankind. In the earliest days after the fallout settled, I tried to mete out vengeance against those responsible for the Cataclysm, unaware that I was setting myself up for my own great fall. I rallied many survivors, broken and disillusioned as I was, and set out on a brutal campaign, forgetting all I had been taught in the desire for revenge. The need to make my wrath into God's wrath. And sure enough, that disastrous journey led to my fall, and I found myself at Hell's gates.
startIntroPart2: Yet in my darkest hour, I found my way again. I rediscovered my faith and my tribe, and realized why I'm still here, able to rise despite having fallen so far. A fire burns inside me, brighter than the fires that burned the world around me. But whether that fire is of undying love or unappeased rage... Whether I show my people's enemies mercy or become once more the instrument of vengeance... That's up to them. And to you, I suppose.
declaringWar: I don't enjoy killing, but when done righteously, it's just a chore, like any other.
attacked: We warned you, and you persisted. Like the dogs you are, you followed us to Zion. And now you stand on holy ground, a temple to God's glory on earth. But the only use for an animal in a temple is sacrifice!
defeated: Yea, we wept when we remembered Zion. But your time will come.
introduction: It's good to meet you. Welcome to Deseret. If you shall be a good neighbor and treat us with brotherly respect, we shall do so in turn.
hateHello: If you harm any of my people, I will find you. Make no mistake. God willing, you will not leave this valley.
denounced: Your cries are like those of a mad beast in a thicket.
afterPeace: Waging war against good people is bad for the soul.
declaringFriendship: In times of darkness, we can turn to the Lord, but it would be good to have you as a friend.
tradeRequest: We are happy to share with you anything you might need.
